name: WP Content Generator Blog Planner FREE for WooCommerce
author: RGB Soluzioni Web

sections.description:
This plugin let you to auto generate blog posts using your WooCommerce Products data. WPCG gets every product informations as tags, taxonomies, prices, etc.
With multiple sets of frases previously created you will generate consistent posts automatically.

PRO VERSION

Download or check out our PRO Version HERE.
sections.installation:
Automatic

Download from the wordpress repository.

Manual

Download the .zip file and extract it in /wp-content/plugins/.
sections.faq:
Our documentation is available HERE.
It will be updated with english and PRO details in the next days.
sections.changelog:
1.0.6

  • New alert in structural phrases that let you know where the WooGetter phrases will appear in your post.
  • You can now use every variable on every phrase on your Structural Phrases section.
  • Updated translations
  • New check that let you change WooCommerce category if there are not products found in the one you choosed.
  • Fixed a bug that adds a br tag when you didnt compiled some phrases.
  • Now variables are with [] and not %% anymore (ex. [taxonomy_value], [current_date], etc)

1.0.5

  • New setting that let you to choose if the plugin will run or not.
  • Insered products in WooGetter posts now let you go on the product by clicking the product ID.
  • Fixed translations.
  • Moved 2 menu entries.

1.0.4

  • Published multilanguage version (ITA/ENG).
  • Minor bugfixes

1.0.3

  • Pubblicata la versione PRO del plugin, senza alcuna limitazione.
  • Aggiunti i link per i contatti e la versione PRO all’interno del menu.
  • Corretto un bug che non faceva apparire alcun messaggio dopo il test degli articoli.
  • Migliorate le notifiche

1.0.2

  • Minor bugfixes.

1.0.1

  • Plugin created.
